TopicTitle: Some advice on why i cannot move

Articles.Content:
A little confused I get into orbit all fine but when I get there  when I cut the thrust I am unable  to move / rotate my rocket at all unless I apply some thrust ?

Thanks

Do you have any mods installed?

Do you have a reaction wheel installed?

Do you have any EC?

Edited December 12, 2018 by linuxgurugamer

17 minutes ago, psvialli said:

A little confused I get into orbit all fine but when I get there  when I cut the thrust I am unable  to move / rotate my rocket at all unless I apply some thrust ?

Thanks

 

How big is your rocket? Posting a picture of it will help. 

You can take in-game screenshots using F1, and most people here on the forum use Imgur﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ (just Google it). Imgur is free and does not require an account. To attach the pictures h﻿ere, once they're fully uploaded, right click on the image and click "copy image addre﻿ss" , then just Ctrl+V it here. 

11 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Do you have any mods installed?

Do you have a reaction wheel installed?

Do you have any EC?

What he said. My hypothesis is that you have a big rocket that does not have the required amount of reaction wheels, so it can't turn,  because there's not enough tourqe. Or you're out of EC.

Just added a Reaction wheel and all works now !

Many thanks  well chuffed

So I know that the problem was fixed, but sometimes what happens to me and this might happen to you as well in the future when you do missions farther from Kerbin. If you don't have a connection to the KSC on a drone ship, it will have the same problem. I guess that wasn't the issue here, but for future missions, it can be.
